entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times. Wind light except gusting to 50 km/h at times. High minus 29. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Blowing snow at times. Wind light except gusting to 50 km/h at times this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 32 with temperature rising to minus 26 by morning. Wind chill minus 44 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 31 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 35 in the morning and minus 40 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
